title: To Do List
description: Project developed using the new version of Vite + React.

title: CookBook
description: CookBook is a recipe catalog with social networking aspects. The idea is that people who have cooking as a hobby can collect and share their own recipes.

title: Imers√£o Alura
description: Project built during Alura's React Immersion NextJS edition.

title: Recipe App
description: The RecipeApp is an Android application that utilizes Retrofit to interact with The Meal DB API as part of a study project. It incorporates a ViewModel-based architecture for enhanced data management. This project was developed during a Udemy course instructed by Denis Panjuta.

title: Music App
description: MusicApp is an Android project conceived during Denis Panjuta's Udemy course. It is devoted to studying and implementing a music application, emphasizing user interface design and usability principles.

title: WishList App
description: WishListApp is an Android project crafted within the Udemy curriculum under Denis Panjuta's guidance. It centers on crafting a wish list employing the Scaffold component and other sophisticated Android techniques, with the goal of deepening comprehension of user interface elements.

title: Caramelo Bot
description: A chatbot created by students at the UFMS for the NGO Abrigo dos bichos.

title: Weather Chatbot
description: ChatBot developed during the Compass Uol scholarship program.
